sources.name: AdventureWorksEmployee
sources.script:
source(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~>  AdventureWorksEmployee

typeProperties.script:
section Section1;
shared AdventureWorksEmployee = let
  AdfDoc = Sql.Database("azuresqlmytestserver.database.windows.net", "AdventureWorks", [CreateNavigationProperties = false]),
  InputTable = AdfDoc{[Schema = "dbo", Item = "Employee"]}[Data]
in
  InputTable;
shared UserQuery = let
  Source = AdventureWorksEmployee,
  #"Added custom" = Table.AddColumn(Source, "TotalHours", each [VacationHours] + [SickLeaveHours])
in
  #"Added custom";
